com.gotenna.sdk

Class GTNotificationCodes

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gotenna.sdk.GTNotificationCodes

  • public class GTNotificationCodes
extends java.lang.Object
    Constants used for Global Notifications. To listen for these, setup a BroadcastReceiver You can use Utils.registerForLocalBroadcast(Context, BroadcastReceiver, String) to help you out with this. Created on 2/6/15.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String GTCONNECTION_DISCONNECTED
      Triggered when the goTenna is disconnected and cannot be re-connected to after some time.
      static java.lang.String GTCONNECTION_ESTABLISHED
      Triggered when the sdk successfully connects to the goTenna.
      static java.lang.String GTCONNECTION_LOST
      Triggered when an outside source causes the goTenna to disconnect.
      static java.lang.String GTNOTIFICATIONS_LOGGING_EVENT
      Triggered when the SDK logs some info related to the goTenna's state.
      static java.lang.String GTNOTIFICATIONS_RSSI_READING_EVENT
      Deprecated, do not use!
      static java.lang.String GTNOTIFICATIONS_WRITE_ERROR_OCCURED
      Triggered when the sdk tried to write some data to the goTenna, but an error occurred.
